description: You've heard of mug cakes, but what about mug lasagnes? This speedy lasagne recipe serves one, is ready in 10 minutes and is cooked in the microwave.
keywords: Pasta,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Lasagne,Comfort food,Quick & easy lunch
name: Mug Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Macro Organic tomato, garlic & basil chunky pasta sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Halve lasagne sheets lengthways. Combine ricotta, oregano and parmesan in a small bowl.
Spread one-quarter of the ricotta mixture over each lasagne strip. Stack sheets, cheese-side up, on top of each other. Roll up to enclose filling.

Place half of the pasta sauce in base of an 8 x 8cm microwave-safe mug. Place lasagne roll into mug and top with remaining pasta sauce. Sprinkle with mozzarella. Microwave on high for 2 minutes or until pasta is tender and sauce is bubbling. Serve.
